倱字的基本解释

倱
hùn
〔倱伅（
传说中远古帝鸿氏之子；
同“混沌”，蒙昧无知。亦作“浑沌”；
大而无形。
d攏 ）〕

倱字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hùn］
［《廣韻》胡本切，上混，匣。］
见“倱伅”。

倱字的康熙字典解释

【子集中】【人字部】　倱； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页109第10
【廣韻】胡本切【集韻】【韻會】戸袞切，?音混。倱伅，不開通貌。　又【廣韻】四凶之一。【玉篇】帝鴻氏有不才子，天下之民謂之倱伅。【左傳】作混沌。

倱字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
倱字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
Cock
hùn
〔倱伅（
The son of the ancient emperor Hong clan in the legend;
Same as "chaos", ignorant and ignorant. Also known as "chaos";
Big and invisible.
d close )]
Cock
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hùn］
["Guangyun" Hu Benqie, upmix, box. ]
See "倱伅".

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Subset] [Human Character Department] 　倱; Kangxi Strokes: 10; Page Number: Page 109-10
[Guang Yun] Hu Benqie [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Jian Gunqie, sound mixing. Don't open up the appearance.　[Guangyun] One of the four evils. [Jade articles] There are talents in the Emperor Hong's family, and the people of the world are called 倱伅. [Zuo Zhuan] As Chaos.
